title: What are the lyrics to “Tum Hi Ho”? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tum Hi Ho lyrics  Lyrics of Tum Hi Ho song from Bollywood Hindi Movie Aashiqui 2 starring Aditya Roy Kapur, Shraddha Kapoor.
